descriptions.text: Waxillium Ladrian, a Roughs lawman turned nobleman, continues to balance duty and justice in Elendel.
Waxillium Ladrian, still the determined lawman‑noble, finds himself drawn into an even larger mystery.
Waxillium Ladrian, the relentless lawman at heart, pursues dangerous leads far from home.
Waxillium Ladrian, the steadfast lawman‑noble, faces truths that test his faith and resolve.
Wayne, Wax’s irreverent partner, masks sharp instincts behind humor and disguise.
Wayne, the mischievous sidekick, provides unorthodox help as the search intensifies.
Wayne, still the loyal partner, reveals surprising heart beneath the jokes.
Wayne, the faithful companion, proves his devotion even in the most serious moments.
Marasi Colms, a driven law officer, brings intelligence and focus to every case.
Marasi, the ambitious investigator, becomes more central to Wax’s pursuit of the truth.
Marasi, still the determined lawwoman, shows growing courage as danger mounts.
Marasi Colms, the unyielding investigator, pushes forward no matter the cost.
Steris Harms, Wax’s meticulous fiancée, carefully plans for every possibility.
Steris, the precise partner, surprises everyone with her level‑headed support.
Steris Harms, still the ever‑prepared noblewoman, proves her worth time and again.
Steris, Wax’s anchor, becomes indispensable in both planning and heart.
MeLaan, a bold kandra, brings her unique skills to Wax’s team.
MeLaan, the spirited kandra, steps into danger to help solve the mystery.
MeLaan, still the daring kandra, proves invaluable as the stakes escalate.
MeLaan, the loyal kandra, stands firm beside her friends when it matters most.
Ranette, the sharp‑tongued weaponsmith, prefers solitude to society.
Ranette, the solitary inventor, supplies Wax’s group with clever devices.
Ranette, still the resourceful weaponsmith, arms the team for what’s ahead.
Ranette, the inventive ally, remains essential even from the sidelines.
Telsin Ladrian, Wax’s sister, is mentioned as distant and enigmatic.
Telsin, the elusive sister, hovers on the edge of Wax’s thoughts.
Telsin Ladrian, still largely a mystery, draws closer to events.
Telsin, Wax’s complicated sister, reveals unexpected layers.
Allik Neverfar, a Southerner with strange knowledge, enters Wax’s path unexpectedly.
Allik, the curious outsider, becomes a guide to unfamiliar truths.
Allik, still the resourceful Southerner, proves vital in unraveling secrets.
Allik Neverfar, the steadfast ally, helps Wax see the world differently.
The Set is a secretive organization whose reach is hinted at in whispered fears.
The Set, the hidden network, becomes more threatening as Wax digs deeper.
The Set, still shadowy, shows its influence spreading far beyond Elendel.
The Set, the dangerous power, stands revealed as a major force behind events.
Suit, Wax’s uncle, is a smooth nobleman with hidden motives.
Suit, the calculating uncle, maneuvers quietly in the background.
Suit, still the manipulative nobleman, exerts his influence from the shadows.
Suit, the scheming uncle, reveals just how far his plans reach.
Agents of the Set operate in secrecy, their names rarely spoken aloud.
The Set’s operatives, the faceless enforcers, emerge as Wax closes in.
The Set’s agents, still dangerous and loyal, spread their influence widely.
The Set’s followers, ruthless to the core, fight to protect their hidden masters.
Harmony, the unseen godlike force, watches quietly over the world.
Harmony, the guiding voice, reaches out to Wax in subtle ways.
Harmony, still the unseen presence, offers guidance Wax doesn’t always want.
Harmony, the enduring god, reminds all that greater designs are at work.
Kelsier, the Survivor, is mentioned only in legend and whispers.
Kelsier, the legendary figure, is spoken of as stories ripple outward.
Kelsier, still the mythic Survivor, remains a shadow across history.
Kelsier, the enduring legend, lingers in the background of events.
Nobles and constables appear on the periphery, shaping Elendel’s daily life.
The minor nobles and constables, the background figures, react to unrest.
These figures, still on the fringes, fill out the world Wax moves through.
Nobles and constables, largely distant, continue to watch from the sidelines.

recaps.Prologue: A shadow from Wax’s past hints that old wounds may not stay buried.

recaps.17: Wax’s instincts drive him deeper into the investigation.

recaps.19: New revelations shake Wax’s understanding of the stakes.
